name: Chalice of the Gods
description:
Collect all the wands, summon all the temples, defeat all the bosses, buy all the boats in this procedurally generated world filled with wands, temples, bosses and boats. and monsters and towns and forests and lakes and deserts and more.

Made in Pico8, a fantasy console, for the Toy Box Jam 2019.

Overworld Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Attack
X - Open Map/Inventory

In Map/Inventory:

Up/Down - Change Item
Left/Right - Swap to Teleport/Inventory menu
Z - Use item/Teleport to Location
X - Exit
